vulnerability.description: A Cross Site Scripting vulnerability was found at: "http://testphp.vulnweb.com/search.php?test=query", using HTTP method POST. The sent post-data was: "searchFor=&goButton=go" which modifies the "searchFor" parameter. This vulnerability was found in the request with id 267.
